translations: v．猛烈抨击，激烈谴责：对某事物表示强烈的不满或愤怒。
· He inveighed against the injustice of the system.
他猛烈抨击了这个制度的不公正。

sentences.sentence: Relatives of the victims (pictured above) inveighed against the killers.
sentences.translation: 受害者的亲属(如上图)对这些残忍的刽子手谩骂不止。

sentences.sentence: Candidates for state and federal office alike inveighed against Barack Obama, Nancy Pelosi and Harry Reid.
sentences.translation: 州和联邦办公室候选人都猛烈地抨击巴拉克.奥巴马、南希佩洛西和哈里.瑞德。

sentences.sentence: After Ludwig Feuerbach had inveighed against the whole philosophy-metaphysics, Max Stirner again declared a war against philosophy-metaphysics, particularly aiming at Ludwig Feuerbach.
sentences.translation: 在费尔巴哈对整个哲学—形而上学进行了猛烈抨击之后，施蒂纳又特别地针对费尔巴哈再度向哲学—形而上学宣战。
